name: Paint Bucket Pals
description:
Oh no! The big bucket fell over!

Dash (LCTRL/A Button) into the paint droplets and shoot (LSHIFT/B Button) them back in the big bucket - in the correct order they escaped! Play through 15 levels - alone or with a friend for frantic coop action!

This game was made for the 'I Can't Draw But Want To Make A Game (Again)' game jam. The music was done by VidaZen.
